LanguageData.BuildDelisle.label: Build De Lisle Commando Carabine
LanguageData.BuildDelisle.description: Build a De lisle Commando Carabine, happy hunting.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildM4Beowulf.label: Build M4.50 Beowulf SC
LanguageData.BuildM4Beowulf.description: Builds the M4.50 Beowulf SC,changing the standard AR barrel to the heavier .50 Beowulf barrel to deal with light armored target and bear size animals. High damage, average range, good rate of fire and accuracy, but not really controllable in burst.\nCaliber: .50 Beowulf(12,7x42mm)
LanguageData.BuildCalico.label: Build M960(M) Calico Carabine
LanguageData.BuildCalico.description: Build the M960 Military Model 9mm Carabine, if you think traditional SMG's banana magazine isn't enough.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildK90M.label: Build a Karabiner M1890
LanguageData.BuildK90M.description: Build a Karabiner M1890, an ancient Bolt Action carabine for cavary, fight for the Fatherland.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildK98k.label: Build a Mauser Karabiner 98k
LanguageData.BuildK98k.description: Build a Mauser Karabiner 98k, an ancient Bolt Action carabine.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge / 7.62x51mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildG41W.label: Build a Gewehr 41(W)
LanguageData.BuildG41W.description: Build a Gewehr 41(Walther), an ancient semi-automatic rifle/carabine(?), no sir, it doesn't use detachable box magazine yet.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildG43K.label: Build a Gewehr 43
LanguageData.BuildG43K.description: Build a Gewehr 43, an ancient semi-automatic rifle/carabine(?), yes, now it use detachable box magazine.\nCaliber: 8mm Mauser Rifle Catridge
LanguageData.BuildVG.label: Build a Gustloff VG 1-5
LanguageData.BuildVG.description: Build a Gustloff Volkssturmgewehr VG 1-5, still have enough time to earn your last Iron Cross...\nCaliber: 7.92x33mm Kurz
